TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Davugele, title = Davugele, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Davugele} }

S.FORM: Davugele Davugele u sulit nu Hulam: u siwkay nu niyazu' i Taitung a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Davugele. u kasalumaluma' nu Davugele sa, 109 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 252 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 198 ku tademaw, pakalatu 79%. u asip nu cidekay a tademaw u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 54 ku tademaw, pakalatu 21%. u kasabinacadan, 與金崙部落混居. macamul mueneng tu Kinlun niyazu'. u Paywan (Paiwan) a niyazu' u Paywan a niyazu' kuyni, katuud ku Paywan a tademaw itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw i Taitung a kuwan, caay katuud ku Sakizaya. inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw itini mueneng. izaw tu hakya, caayhenay pasumad tu ngangan nu cidekay. inayay ku cacudadan i Davugele niyazu'. inayay ku kyukay i Davugele niyazu'. u cidekay nu Taywan yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 10 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bulad pulung sausi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yuwatan (58,465), Rukay (13,319), Puyuma (14,170), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taluku (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laaluwa (401), Kanakanabu (335), zuma (11,985)

Davogele Davogele o solit no Holam: o siwkay no niyazo' i Taitong a kowan ko niyazo' no Davogele. o kasalomaloma' no Davogele sa, 109 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 252 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 198 ko tademaw, pakalato 79%. o asip no cidekay a tademaw o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 54 ko tademaw, pakalato 21%. o kasabinacadan, 與金崙部落混居. macamol moeneng to Kinlon niyazo'. o Paywan (Paiwan) a niyazo' o Paywan a niyazo' koyni, katood ko Paywan a tademaw itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw i Taitong a kowan, caay katood ko Sakizaya. inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw itini moeneng. izaw to hakya, caayhenay pasomad to ngangan no cidekay. inayay ko cacodadan i Davogele niyazo'. inayay ko kyokay i Davogele niyazo'. o cidekay no Taywan yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 10 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bolad polong saosi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yowatan (58,465), Rokay (13,319), Poyoma (14,170), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taloko (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laalowa (401), Kanakanabo (335), zoma (11,985)
